entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 12:49 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: SW 34 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:49 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
